graphql.query:
query environmentLogs($afterDate: String, $afterLimit: Int, $anchorDate: String, $beforeDate: String, $beforeLimit: Int, $environmentId: String!, $filter: String) {
  environmentLogs(
    afterDate: $afterDate
    afterLimit: $afterLimit
    anchorDate: $anchorDate
    beforeDate: $beforeDate
    beforeLimit: $beforeLimit
    environmentId: $environmentId
    filter: $filter
  ) {
    __typename
    # attributes # The attributes that were parsed from a structured log
    message # The contents of the log message
    severity # The severity of the log message (eg. err)
    # tags # The tags that were associated with the log
    timestamp # The timestamp of the log message in format RFC3339 (nano)
  }
}
graphql.variables:
{
	"afterDate": null,
	"afterLimit": null,
	"anchorDate": null,
	"beforeDate": null,
	"beforeLimit": null,
	"environmentId": null,
	"filter": null
}

graphql.query:
query httpLogs($afterDate: String, $afterLimit: Int, $anchorDate: String, $beforeDate: String, $beforeLimit: Int, $deploymentId: String!, $endDate: String, $filter: String, $limit: Int, $startDate: String) {
  httpLogs(
    afterDate: $afterDate
    afterLimit: $afterLimit
    anchorDate: $anchorDate
    beforeDate: $beforeDate
    beforeLimit: $beforeLimit
    deploymentId: $deploymentId
    endDate: $endDate
    filter: $filter
    limit: $limit
    startDate: $startDate
  ) {
    __typename
    clientUa # The client user agent
    deploymentId # The deployment ID that was requested
    deploymentInstanceId # The deployment instance ID that was requested
    downstreamProto # The downstream HTTP protocol version
    edgeRegion # The edge region the client connected to
    host # The requested host
    httpStatus # The http status of the log
    method # The request HTTP method
    path # The requested path
    requestId # The unique request ID
    responseDetails # Details about the upstream response
    rxBytes # Received bytes
    srcIp # The source IP of the request
    timestamp # The timestamp the log was created
    totalDuration # The total duration the request took
    txBytes # Outgoing bytes
    upstreamAddress # The upstream address
    upstreamProto # The upstream HTTP protocol version
    upstreamRqDuration # How long the upstream request took to respond
  }
}
graphql.variables:
{
	"afterDate": null,
	"afterLimit": null,
	"anchorDate": null,
	"beforeDate": null,
	"beforeLimit": null,
	"deploymentId": null,
	"endDate": null,
	"filter": null,
	"limit": null,
	"startDate": null
}

graphql.query:
query metrics($averagingWindowSeconds: Int, $endDate: DateTime, $environmentId: String, $groupBy: [MetricTag]!, $includeDeleted: Boolean, $measurements: [MetricMeasurement!]!, $pluginId: String, $projectId: String, $sampleRateSeconds: Int, $serviceId: String, $startDate: DateTime!, $teamId: String, $volumeId: String, $volumeInstanceExternalId: String, $workspaceId: String) {
  metrics(
    averagingWindowSeconds: $averagingWindowSeconds
    endDate: $endDate
    environmentId: $environmentId
    groupBy: $groupBy
    includeDeleted: $includeDeleted
    measurements: $measurements
    pluginId: $pluginId
    projectId: $projectId
    sampleRateSeconds: $sampleRateSeconds
    serviceId: $serviceId
    startDate: $startDate
    teamId: $teamId
    volumeId: $volumeId
    volumeInstanceExternalId: $volumeInstanceExternalId
    workspaceId: $workspaceId
  ) {
    __typename
    measurement # The measurement of the metric.
    # tags # The tags that were used to group the metric. Only the tags that were used to by will be present.
    # values # The samples of the metric.
  }
}
graphql.variables:
{
	"averagingWindowSeconds": null,
	"endDate": null,
	"environmentId": null,
	"groupBy": [null],
	"includeDeleted": null,
	"measurements": [null],
	"pluginId": null,
	"projectId": null,
	"sampleRateSeconds": null,
	"serviceId": null,
	"startDate": null,
	"teamId": null,
	"volumeId": null,
	"volumeInstanceExternalId": null,
	"workspaceId": null
}
